attributes.action: review the law over conditioning of children, towards the absent parent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have got access to my child and it is blatently obvious that my daughter has been conditioned to not see me. those who are responsible should have to face consequences. now i have two options available to me 1) go back to court and force contact. 2) force my daughter to go into care. none of these are viable for a loving parent. Come on government take the rights of absent parents, children who want contact, make it easier for us all.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
